forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
